name: The Ramsey
description:
The Ramsay is a 2D platformer with cute squirrel characters living on a planet comprised of six huge islands. Players can explore various areas by solving mazes and puzzles using the Cotton Gun, a special weapon wielded by the playable squirrel Ramsey that makes objects float in the air. Ramsey came to Earth aboard a Space Running Wheel from the faraway planet of Chipmars, and now shares tales of his adventures back home with his hamster friend, Cheese. Climate change caused by the greed of the evil inventor rendered all of Chipmars near inhospitable to the native rodent population. Find out how Ramsey fought this catastrophe, and why he came to Earth.


- A 2D platformer with exploration and solving puzzles using various weapons.


- Unique gameplay utilizing the state-of-the-art Cotton Gun from Chipmars.
